# The ECOTOX Thematic Sheet N°48 in a nutshell

<p class="plain-text">
Together with <a href='https://www.raphaelroyaute.com/'>Raphaël Royauté</a>, we have crafted a Thematic Sheet (N°48) for the <a href='https://eng-ecotox.hub.inrae.fr/'>French ECOTOX network</a>. 
The aim of this article is to offer a non-exhaustive yet insightful overview of the current landscape in behavioral ecotoxicology.</p>  
<p class="plain-text">
Our short review leverages open-source technologies and artificial intelligence (AI) to tackle the complexities of behavioral data analysis, representing a significant step forward in our collective understanding of contaminants’ impacts on animals.</p>
<p class="plain-text">
Although this thematic sheet offers a snapshot that may quickly become outdated due to the rapid evolution of methods and tools, especially those referring to AI, it is intended as a valuable resource for researchers eager to explore the fascinating field of behavioral ecotoxicology more deeply.</p>


<p class="plain-text">
The full article is available (in French language only) <a href='https://ecotox.hub.inrae.fr/content/download/6168/74743?version=1'>here</a>.</p>
